name: UploadX
body:
# Welcome to the UploadX Page
## What is UploadX?
UploadX is a student project aiming to bring the functionality of the [ShareX](https://getsharex.com/) platform to Linux through Python.

## Why?
We enjoy the ease at which ShareX and [services like it](http://puush.me/) allow users to upload and distribute images from their computers. We found a lack of such service on Linux distributions and decided to create our own service using Python as a multi-platform distribution method.

## Dependencies
UploadX depends on several libraries.  
[Asynchronous File Reader](http://stefaanlippens.net/python-asynchronous-subprocess-pipe-reading)  
[pyxhook](https://github.com/JeffHoogland/pyxhook)  
[qrcode](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/qrcode)  
[pygtk](http://www.pygtk.org/)

## Documents
### [Design Review](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1xVYSLjjtOdZOVBT24FwB704D4iR-mPD3Bf2t08GrXi8/edit#slide=id.gad3363159_1_48)
[Design Review Prep Document](http://daniel6.github.io/softdes2015finalproject/DesignReviewPreparation.pdf)

### [Code Review](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1nXv19c0h31asC9COsHGABKQm0t-8PkYj26wn3QOnsHE/edit#slide=id.p)
[Code Review Prep Document](http://daniel6.github.io/softdes2015finalproject/CodeReviewPreparation.pdf)
